name: RA02A-Wireless Smoke Detector
tagline: Reliable Smoke Detection with Wireless Communication
description: RA02A is a smoke detection alarm featuring a built-in photoelectric smoke detector and buzzer. It detects smoke density in the environment and sounds an alarm when the density exceeds a preset threshold. In addition, the alarm data can be transmitted to other devices for display. RA02A utilizes the SX1276 wireless communication module for LoRaWAN™ Class A connectivity.

specifications.title: Power Supply
specifications.value: 2 x 1.5V AAA alkaline batteries; Operating Voltage Range: 2.3V – 3.3V

specifications.title: Battery Lifetime
specifications.value: Approximately 4.7 years (at ambient 25°C, reporting every 60 min, TX power = 20dBm, LoRa spreading factor SF = 10)

specifications.title: Current Consumption
specifications.value: Standby: 12 μA at 3VDC; Working current while alarming: 580 mA at 3VDC

specifications.title: Alarming
specifications.value: Alarming level: 85 dBm @ 3m; Smoke concentration: 0.65 – 15.5% obs/m

specifications.title: Frequency
specifications.value: Frequency Range: 863MHz–928MHz & 470MHz–510MHz; TX power varies by region (e.g., US915: 20dBm, AS923: 16dBm, AU915: 20dBm, CN470: 19.15dBm, EU868: 16dBm, KR920: 14dBm, IN865: 20dBm)

specifications.title: Antenna & Range
specifications.value: Built-in antenna; Communication range up to 10 km (line of sight)

specifications.title: Modulation
specifications.value: Supports both LoRa and FSK modulation

specifications.title: Operating Conditions
specifications.value: Operating Temperature: -10°C – 55°C; Storage Temperature: -40°C – 85°C; Storage Humidity: <90% RH

features: Built-in photoelectric smoke detector and buzzer
SX1276 wireless communication module for LoRaWAN™ Class A
Configurable via third-party platforms (Actility / ThingPark, TTN, MyDevices / Cayenne)
Low power consumption and long battery life
